summary: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th century Denmark.
cast: Kirsten Andreasen|Sigurd Berg|Harald Holst|Albert Høeberg|Emanuel Jørgensen|Sophie Knudsen|Preben Lerdorff Rye|Lisbeth Movin|Preben Neergaard|Sigrid Neiiendam|Emilie Nielsen|Thorkild Roose|Anna Svierkier|Hans Christian Sørensen|Olaf Ussing|Dagmar Wildenbrück
title: Dies irae
